title: Airplanes over the City
medium: linoleum cuts on paper with collage elements
credit_line: Edward N. Haskell Family Acquisition Fund
provenance_text:
Olga Rozanova [1886-1918]. The Museum of Modern Art, New York, NY until 1993 [1]; Helen Serger, La Boetie, Inc., New York, NY; Carus Gallery, New York, NY; C. Michael O'Brian, New York, NY; purchased by Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, Pa, June 1994.

Notes:
[1]. Deaccessioned by MoMA in 1993 (formerly MoMA # 193.82), in part-exchange for the complete folio "Voina" (see correspondence with C. Michael O'Brien in curatorial file for provenance information.)
